note: You will get some progress for this
by working on other goals.
The easiest to go for are:
Mushroom (10k), Oak Wood (5k), Potato (25k),
Obsidian (10k), Sand (5k), Wheat (10k) and End Stone (10k)
Buy a Dirt Bottle (100k) from the Smithmonger in the Hub (-32 69 -135)
and reforge an uncommon or higher rarity weapon with it.
Mine Diamonds in the Deep Caverns until you get a Rare Diamond to apply.
Safe spot to do this is between the Diamond Reserve and
the Obsidian Sanctuary (-20 27 70).
Mobs don't spawn there.
Doing this will bring you close
to your 8th Minion Slot.
Try to craft every cheap minion you can
get your hands on while doing other things.
For this you can either go for Garden Level 9
(full plot needs 304 red and brown mushrooms),
or use an axe with Silk Touch and mine the mushroom blocks
on the Desert Island.
If you use the Garden, you might have to collect some
mushrooms outside of it after hitting the required amount.
Costs 256 Enchanted Oak Wood to craft and
unlocks at Oak Wood Collection 9 (30k).
Optimal for this would be using a Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
and having the Haste 3 potion effect.
You can easily do this in the Garden. Potato unlocks at Garden Level 3
and one plot requires 7,896 potatoes to fill. Try to get yourself an
Advanced Gardening Hoe (25 Copper). You might have to get a few potatoes
outside of the Garden to complete this once you reached the amount.
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes on owocato's, xMeru's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it, get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while some Ender Armor and/or Equipment.
This unlocks at Diamond Collection 6 (5k). To craft it, you need
1 Enchanted Diamond and 8 Vines (those will cost 40 Jungle Leaves to buy
and need Jungle Wood Collection 4 to unlock it in the /trades menu.
You can also use this in a minion to help getting Diamond Collection 7 passive.
To get this Crystal you have to talk to The King in the Crystal Hollows
with 3 Goblin Eggs of the same color and then go to
The Queens Area (also in the Crystal Hollows) to get the Crystal.
You can use Wishing Compasses to locate the structures.
The following list of skills is a suggestion that you can go for:
Mining 20, Foraging 18, Combat 16, Farming 21,
Enchanting 20, Carpentry 13, Taming 20, Fishing 10 and Alchemy 16.
Try to utilize Jerry's mayor rotation for this.
Look for mobs with a purple name.
Reforge your Void Sword to Sharp
at the Blacksmith in the Hub (-28 69 -125),
or enchant any weapon with Critical 5 (costs 50 Levels).
You can use all your minion slots for this (don't forget to
buy your daily Obsidian in the End every day to craft them),
mine Ender Nodes and kill Obsidian Defenders in the Dragons Nest.
Optimal for this would be using a Golden Axe with Efficiency 5 and
having the Haste 3 potion effect to chop down Oak. Reforge your Axe to Lumberjack's
or buy a Moil Log (50k) from the Smithmonger in the Hub (-32 69 -135)
and apply it to your axe for more Foraging Wisdom.
Claim your cake buff (visit owocato, xMeru or prtl for it)
hold an angler 4 or 5 rod and visit someone with a Sea Creature Chance beacon
(visit PrincessVictra , ReyMaratov or Rutetid_).
You can also wait for Jerry to bring Marina's perks to complete this.
Kill goblins or open loot chests in the Crystal Hollows,
then just throw them until you get a Golden Goblin.
Only throw them in the Dwarven Mines!
It follows a list of more than 22 accessories you can go for:
Buyable from the Adventurer in the Hub (-41 70 -64):
Zombie/Skeleton Talisman: 500 coins each
Village/Mine Affinity Talisman: 2.5k coins each
Intimidation/Scavenger Talisman: 10k coins each
Collection Talismans:
Night Vision Charm (Mushroom 7)
Farming Talisman (Wheat 4), Vaccine Talisman (Potato 3)
Talisman of Coins (Emerald 2), Magnetic Talisman (Emerald 3)
Wood Affinity Talisman (Oak Wood 8), Gravity Talisman (Obsidian 3)
Speed Talisman (Sugar Cane 2), Potion Affinity Talisman (Nether Wart 3)
Other:
Archaeologists Compass, Shiny Yellow Rock, Campfire Initiate Badge,
King Talisman, Cat Talisman, Spider Talisman, Frozen Chicken,
Red Claw Talisman (Wolf Slayer Level 1), Mineral Talisman,
Green Jerry Talisman (6.61% from Jerry Boxes), Candy Talisman,
New Year Cake Bag (250k), Glacial Talisman (Frozen Treasure).
Don't forget to take the 4 Bonus accessory bag slots from
the Redstone Miner (24 104 16), he asks for 1920 Redstone in total.
Collect those you run along while doing other goals. If you have trouble
check TimeDeo's fairy soul tutorial on YouTube.
This requires Catacombs Level 3 and a completion of the 2 floors before.
Try this when Jerry has Mayor Paul's perks active to make it easier
by looking through party finder or finding some friends to assist you.
